name: M. Night Shamalan's The Last Airbender
name_original: M. Night Shamalan's The Last Airbender
description:
M. Night Shamalan's The Last Airbender is an action game developed by THQ Australia. It was originally released in 2010. THQ published the game.
You can play M. Night Shamalan's The Last Airbender on Nintendo DS and Wii.
